summary: Completed comprehensive testing of printable reports feature with logo upload, website settings, and leaderboard functionality. All backend API tests pass (17/17). Frontend UI tests confirm all features working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: Logo upload with PNG image (POST /api/admin/settings/logo)
Backend: Logo upload with JPEG image
Backend: Logo retrieval returns base64 data URL (GET /api/admin/settings/logo)
Backend: Logo deletion (DELETE /api/admin/settings/logo)
Backend: Invalid file type rejection (400 error for non-image files)
Backend: Logo upload requires authentication
Backend: Logo deletion requires admin role
Backend: Website settings retrieval (GET /api/admin/settings/website)
Backend: Website settings update (PUT /api/admin/settings/website)
Backend: Website settings persistence across requests
Backend: Leaderboard endpoints (rounds, classes, events, minor-rounds)
Frontend: Admin login with credentials (admin/admin123)
Frontend: Settings dialog opens with Report Settings section
Frontend: Organization Logo section with Upload Logo button
Frontend: File input accepts PNG, JPEG, WebP formats
Frontend: Website & Organization section with inputs
Frontend: Save Settings button updates website settings
Frontend: Settings persist after dialog close/reopen
Frontend: Leaderboard page loads with all filters
Frontend: Leaderboard Type dropdown (Single Round / Minor Rounds)
Frontend: Round dropdown (hidden when Minor Rounds selected)
Frontend: Class filter dropdown
Frontend: Score Display dropdown (Average/Total)
Frontend: Print Options checkbox (Show Scores)
Frontend: Print Report button enabled when data available
Frontend: Back button with data-testid
critical_code_review_comments: Print report implementation is well-structured with proper CSS for print media
Logo is stored as base64 in MongoDB which is appropriate for small images (2MB limit enforced)
Website settings use query parameters instead of request body - works but could be improved with Pydantic model
seed_data_creation: Backend tests created test logo and website settings data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Printable reports feature is fully implemented and tested. Logo upload, website settings, and print preview all working. Print preview opens in new window with professional formatting including logo, event info, leaderboard table, and footer with timestamp/website. Minor Rounds cumulative leaderboard shows appropriate message when no minor rounds exist.

features_verified.logo_upload: Working - accepts PNG, JPG, WebP up to 2MB
features_verified.logo_deletion: Working - Remove button appears when logo exists
features_verified.website_settings: Working - Organization name and URL persist correctly
features_verified.leaderboard_filters: Working - Leaderboard Type, Round, Class, Score Display all functional
features_verified.print_report: Working - Button enabled, opens new window with formatted report
features_verified.print_options: Working - Show Scores checkbox controls score column visibility
